metadata.name: Pirate Radio - Aaron Penne
metadata.description:
NFT Pirate Radio is a weekly live broadcast featuring an interview with a notable creator or project team active in web3, hosted by artist Chuck Anderson (NoPattern). The interview is produced & bookended by a live piano performance by Yuri Rybak.

Each week, Chuck remixes an artwork by the speaker to create a promotional poster. A collection of these posters are now available to be purchased as editions, with proceeds going to Mint Fund, a community-owned and funded initiative helping BIPOC and LGBTQIA+ crypto creators mint NFTs.
